p: Total RNA of the cells and the tissues was extracted with TRIzol reagent (Invitrogen); RNA from culture supernatants was extracted with the RNAqueous-Micro kit (Thermo Fisher Scientific). EV-A71 was determined in a SYBR green two-step qRT-PCR assay (Bio-Rad). The primer sequencing of EV-A71 was performed as described previously ( 18).
